languages.text: "Перед вами — будущий новатор Дома Орселлио. Выжившая в бойне на станции Эурак-V. Пережившая покушение во дворце Даргонуса. Восстановившая стабильность в Доме лишь за то жалкое время, что оказалась на свободе, пока вы, все вы, годами разрушали его изнутри! Перед вами прошедшая сквозь шторм Моря Душ к истинному Атласу и союзница Вольного Торговца. И вы все еще считаете меня недостойной? Юной? Неопытной? Преклоните колени. И я прощу вам вашу дерзость".

traits.locale_text: "Перед вами — будущий новатор Дома Орселлио. Выжившая в бойне на станции Эурак-V. Пережившая покушение во дворце Даргонуса. Восстановившая стабильность в Доме лишь за то жалкое время, что оказалась на свободе, пока вы, все вы, годами разрушали его изнутри! Перед вами прошедшая сквозь шторм Моря Душ к истинному Атласу и союзница Вольного Торговца. И вы все еще считаете меня недостойной? Юной? Неопытной? Преклоните колени. И я прощу вам вашу дерзость".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You address the future Novator of House Orsellio. One who survived the massacre of Eurac V. Who has lived following an attempt on her life at the palace of Dargonus. Who has restored her House's stability in what scant time she has been free while you — all of you — have spent years destroying it from within! You address one who has passed through the tempest of the Sea of Souls to the true Atlas as a Rogue Trader's ally. Yet, still you call me unworthy, don't you? Young? Inexperienced? Kneel before me, and I shall forgive you your insolence."
languages.original_text: "Перед вами — будущий новатор Дома Орселлио. Выжившая в бойне на станции Эурак-V. Пережившая покушение во дворце Даргонуса. Восстановившая стабильность в Доме лишь за то жалкое время, что оказалась на свободе, пока вы, все вы, годами разрушали его изнутри! Перед вами прошедшая сквозь шторм Моря Душ к истинному Атласу и союзница Вольного Торговца. И вы все еще считаете меня недостойной? Юной? Неопытной? Преклоните колени. И я прощу вам вашу дерзость".

You address she who has passed through the tempest of the Sea of Souls to the true Atlas as a Rogue Trader's ally. Yet still you call me unworthy? Young? Inexperienced? Kneel before me, and I shall forgive you your insolence."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「未来のオーセリオ家のノベイターに思いをはせなさい。ユーラック・Vの大虐殺を生き延びた者に。命がけでダルゴナスの宮殿に仕えてきた者に。ごくわずかな自由な時間をオーセリオ家の復興に費やしてきた者に。あなたが…あなた方皆が…オーセリオ家を内部から壊していた歳月の間に！自由開拓者の仲間として、魂の海の嵐を抜けて真のアトラスへ向かう者に思いをはせなさい。これでも、あたくしはふさわしくありませんか？青二才？未熟？あたくしにひざまずけば、先ほどの無礼は許しましょう」
languages.original_text: "You address the future Novator of House Orsellio. One who survived the massacre of Eurac V. Who has lived following an attempt on her life at the palace of Dargonus. Who has restored her House's stability in what scant time she has been free while you — all of you — have spent years destroying it from within! You address one who has passed through the tempest of the Sea of Souls to the true Atlas as a Rogue Trader's ally. Yet, still you call me unworthy, don't you? Young? Inexperienced? Kneel before me, and I shall forgive you your insolence."

traits.locale_text: 「未来のオーセリオ家のノベイターに思いをはせなさい。ユーラック・Vの大虐殺を生き延びた者に。命がけでダルゴナスの宮殿に仕えてきた者に。ごくわずかな自由な時間をオーセリオ家の復興に費やしてきた者に。あなたが…あなた方皆が…オーセリオ家を内部から壊していた歳月の間に！自由開拓者の仲間として、魂の海の嵐を抜けて真のアトラスへ向かう者に思いをはせなさい。これでも、あたくしはふさわしくありませんか？青二才？未熟？あたくしにひざまずけば、先ほどの無礼は許しましょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “此刻站在你面前的人，是奥赛罗家族未来的大族长。她在欧拉克五号星站的大屠杀中幸存下来，在达戈努斯宫殿的暗杀袭击中活了下来。她用她极其有限的自由时间，恢复了家族的稳定。可你们，你们所有人，这么多年来一直都在危害我们的家族！她穿越了灵魂之海的风暴，来到了圣仪真正的神殿，成为了行商浪人的盟友。可你，你依然觉得我不配，对不对？你说我年轻？没有经验？立刻在我面前跪下，我愿意原谅你的无礼。”
languages.original_text: "You address the future Novator of House Orsellio. One who survived the massacre of Eurac V. Who has lived following an attempt on her life at the palace of Dargonus. Who has restored her House's stability in what scant time she has been free while you — all of you — have spent years destroying it from within! You address one who has passed through the tempest of the Sea of Souls to the true Atlas as a Rogue Trader's ally. Yet, still you call me unworthy, don't you? Young? Inexperienced? Kneel before me, and I shall forgive you your insolence."

traits.locale_text: “此刻站在你面前的人，是奥塞罗家族未来的大族长。她在欧拉克五号星的大屠杀中幸存下来，在达戈努斯宫殿的暗杀袭击中活了下来。她用她极其有限的自由时间，恢复了家族的稳定。可你们，你们所有人，这么多年来一直都在危害我们的家族！她穿越了灵魂之海的风暴，来到了圣仪真正的神殿，成为了行商浪人的盟友。可你，你依然觉得我不配，对不对？你说我年轻？没有经验？立刻在我面前跪下，我愿意原谅你的无礼。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous vous adressez à la future Novator de la maison Orsellio. À celle qui a survécu au massacre d'Eurac-V et à une tentative d'assassinat au palais de Dargonus. Qui a mis à profit le peu de temps qu'elle a passé en liberté pour restaurer la stabilité de sa maison, alors que vous aviez passé des années à la détruire de l'intérieur ! À celle qui a traversé la tempête de la Mer des Âmes et qui est devenue l'alliée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Et malgré tout, vous me trouvez indigne ? Trop jeune ? Inexpérimentée ? Prosternez-vous devant moi, et je vous pardonnerai votre insolence. »
languages.original_text: "You address the future Novator of House Orsellio. One who survived the massacre of Eurac V. Who has lived following an attempt on her life at the palace of Dargonus. Who has restored her House's stability in what scant time she has been free while you — all of you — have spent years destroying it from within! You address one who has passed through the tempest of the Sea of Souls to the true Atlas as a Rogue Trader's ally. Yet, still you call me unworthy, don't you? Young? Inexperienced? Kneel before me, and I shall forgive you your insolence."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous adressez à la future Novator de la maison Orsellio. À celle qui a survécu au massacre d'Eurac-V et à une tentative d'assassinat au palais de Dargonus. Qui a mis à profit le peu de temps qu'elle a passé en liberté pour restaurer la stabilité de sa maison, alors que vous aviez passé des années à la détruire de l'intérieur ! À celle qui a traversé la tempête de la Mer des Âmes et qui est devenue l'alliée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Et malgré tout, vous me trouvez indigne ? Trop jeune ? Inexpérimentée ? Prosternez-vous devant moi, et je vous pardonnerai votre insolence. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Te estás dirigiendo a la próxima Novator de la casa Orsellio. A la superviviente de la masacre de Eurac V. A la superviviente de un intento de asesinato en el palacio de Dargonus. ¡A la mujer que ha restaurado la estabilidad de su casa en el poco tiempo que ha tenido a su disposición mientras que vosotros, todos vosotros, habéis pasado años destruyéndola desde dentro! Te diriges a la Navegante que ha atravesado la tempestad del Mar de Almas para llegar al auténtico Atlas como aliada de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. ¿Y osas llamarme indigna, a pesar de todo? ¿Joven? ¿Inexperta? Arrodíllate ante mí, y aún puede que perdone tu insolencia».
languages.original_text: "You address the future Novator of House Orsellio. One who survived the massacre of Eurac V. Who has lived following an attempt on her life at the palace of Dargonus. Who has restored her House's stability in what scant time she has been free while you — all of you — have spent years destroying it from within! You address one who has passed through the tempest of the Sea of Souls to the true Atlas as a Rogue Trader's ally. Yet, still you call me unworthy, don't you? Young? Inexperienced? Kneel before me, and I shall forgive you your insolence."

traits.locale_text: «Te estás dirigiendo a la próxima Novator de la casa Orsellio. A la superviviente de la masacre de Eurac V. A la superviviente de un intento de asesinato en el palacio de Dargonus. ¡A la mujer que ha restaurado la estabilidad de su casa en el poco tiempo que ha tenido a su disposición mientras que vosotros, todos vosotros, habéis pasado años destruyéndola desde dentro! Te diriges a la Navegante que ha atravesado la tempestad del mar de almas para llegar al auténtico Atlas como aliada de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. ¿Y osas llamarme indigna, a pesar de todo? ¿Joven? ¿Inexperta? Arrodíllate ante mí, y aún puede que perdone tu insolencia».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht mit der zukünftigen Novatorin des Hauses Orsellio. Mit einer, die das Massaker auf Eurac V überlebt hat. Die ein Attentat im Palast von Dargonus überlebt hat. Die in der kurzen Zeit ihrer Freiheit die Stabilität ihres Hauses wiederhergestellt hat, während Ihr — Ihr alle — Jahre damit zugebracht habt, es von innen heraus zu zerstören! Ihr sprecht mit einer, die als Verbündete {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} den Sturm des Meers der Seelen durchquert hat, um zum wahren Atlas zu gelangen. Und doch nennt Ihr mich noch immer unwürdig, nicht wahr? Jung? Unerfahren? Kniet vor mir nieder, dann vergebe ich Euch Eure Unverfrorenheit."
languages.original_text: "You address the future Novator of House Orsellio. One who survived the massacre of Eurac V. Who has lived following an attempt on her life at the palace of Dargonus. Who has restored her House's stability in what scant time she has been free while you — all of you — have spent years destroying it from within! You address one who has passed through the tempest of the Sea of Souls to the true Atlas as a Rogue Trader's ally. Yet, still you call me unworthy, don't you? Young? Inexperienced? Kneel before me, and I shall forgive you your insolence."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht mit der zukünftigen Novatorin des Hauses Orsellio. Mit ihr, die das Massaker auf Eurac V überlebt hat. Die ein Attentat im Palast von Dargonus überlebt hat. Die in der kurzen Zeit ihrer Freiheit die Stabilität ihres Hauses wiederhergestellt hat, während Ihr — Ihr alle — Jahre damit zugebracht habt, es von innen heraus zu zerstören! Ihr sprecht mit ihr, die als Verbündete {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} den Sturm des Meers der Seelen durchquert hat, um zum wahren Atlas zu gelangen. Und doch nennt Ihr mich noch immer unwürdig, nicht wahr? Jung? Unerfahren? Kniet vor mir nieder, dann vergebe ich Euch Eure Unverfrorenheit."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Karşında, Orsellio Hanesi'nin müstakbel Rota Reisi var. Eurac V'teki katliamdan sağ çıktım. Dargonus'ta sarayda canıma kastedenleri savdım. Özgür kaldığım kısıtlı sürede Hanemin dengesini yeniden sağladım. Oysa siz... Hepiniz, kaç yıldır Hanemizi içten içe yok etmekle meşguldünüz! Karşında, Hür Tacir'in müttefiki olarak Ruhlar Denizi'nin fırtınalarını aşıp gerçek Atlas'a ulaşan ben varım. Buna rağmen ben mi layık değilim? Ben mi fazla gencim? Ben mi tecrübesizim? Karşımda diz çökersen bu küstahlığını affedeceğim."
languages.original_text: "You address the future Novator of House Orsellio. One who survived the massacre of Eurac V. Who has lived following an attempt on her life at the palace of Dargonus. Who has restored her House's stability in what scant time she has been free while you — all of you — have spent years destroying it from within! You address one who has passed through the tempest of the Sea of Souls to the true Atlas as a Rogue Trader's ally. Yet, still you call me unworthy, don't you? Young? Inexperienced? Kneel before me, and I shall forgive you your insolence."

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nin müstakbel Rota Reisi'ne hitap etmektesin. Eurac V'teki katliamdan sağ çıktım. Dargonus'taki sarayımda canıma kastedenleri savdım. Özgür kaldığım kısıtlı sürede Hanemin dengesini yeniden sağladım. Oysa siz, hepiniz, kaç yıldır Hanemizi içten içe yok etmekle meşguldünüz! Bir Hür Tacir'in müttefiki olarak Ruhlar Denizi'nin fırtınasını aşıp gerçek Atlas'a ulaşan bana hitap etmektesin. Buna rağmen ben mi layık değilim? Ben mi fazla gencim? Ben mi tecrübesizim? Karşımda diz çökersen bu küstahlığını affedeceğim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
